Title: Outdoor Swing in Off White Colour

Details.Dimensions:: H 55 x W 27 x D 25 (All dimensions are in inches)

Description: The Swingzy macrame swing chair For Home and Balcony is crafted to the highest quality.This outdoor and indoor swing chair is sold with everything needed for easy setup.  A swing is a hanging seat, often found at playgrounds for children and now also popularly used as items of indoor furniture. The seat of a swing may be suspended from chains or ropes. Once a swing is in motion, it continues to oscillate like a pendulum until external interference or drag brings it to a halt.
